description.en-US: Instantly convert files without compromising on quality with the Document Converter & Search add-on. Easily convert JPG, DOC, PPT, XLS, or PNG files to PDF and vice versa. Merge documents, presentations, and spreadsheets into a single PDF. You can also preview and share files via WhatsApp, email, or by copying a link. This add-on will change your default search engine to Yahoo®. How it works To use the file converter tool: 1. Click the Document Converter & Search favicon on the toolbar. 2. Select the file formats you want to convert 'from' and 'to’ (e.g. PDF to PPT) on the file converter tool. 3. Drag and drop a file or upload one from your computer and click ‘Convert.’ 4. Download and share your converted file. To use web search: Search as normal from any web search box. Get search results that include videos, images, news articles, audio files and more with Yahoo® as the default search engine. Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you: https://documentconverter.com/public/contactus_ff.html You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here: https://documentconverter.com/public/uninstall_ff.html By clicking the button above, I consent to install this extension and abide by its Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Companies, product and service names, brands, logos or images mentioned here are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. Use of them here does not imply any endorsement by or affiliation with their respective holders. Our Privacy Policy: Document Converter & Search is a product offered by AtomApplications.com LLC. Here is a summary of the user data that our add-on collects and how we process it: Information explicitly shared by users: When using this add-on, we collect and process the files and inputs provided by you to generate relevant results. Additionally, if you choose to provide us with information such as your name, telephone number, or email address through feedback forms, crash reports, enhancement suggestions, or other forms of communication, we may collect and process that information. This data is solely used to address user queries, concerns, and will not be shared with any third parties. Please review our full Privacy Policy for more detailed information on how we handle and safeguard your data. Privacy Policy: https://documentconverter.com/public/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service:https://documentconverter.com/public/termsofservice_ff.html

summary.en-US: Document Converter & Search provides a file conversion tool via the favicon on the toolbar along with web search results by Yahoo®.
